turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Karthik (singer).
turn.2: In 2010, he sang a track "Behene De", from Hindi film "Raavan", which is widely considered as the biggest song in his career.
turn.3: Did it chart on the top charts?
turn.4: The track, which topped music charts for many continuous weeks, also received rave critical reviews.
turn.5: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.6: Karthik also performed the Tamil and Telugu versions of the same song, titled "Usure Poghudhey" and "Usire Poyene" respectively.
turn.7: Did he sing any other songs?
turn.8: He also sang "Adhigora Choodu" in the movie Mirapakaay.
turn.10: Karthik received wide appreciations for the theme song of 10th World Tamil Conference by Composer Rajan Somasundaram.
turn.11: What was the name of that song?
turn.12: Titled as Yathum Oore Anthem and released as a Music video and single, Karthik sang along with Bombay Jayashri and many other international artists to give the first ever musical form for this 2000 year old poetry.
